You http://wn.com/Allen_Iverson_55_pts_Playoff_Career_High_vs_NO_Hornets_2003 Philadelphia 98, New Orleans 90 Allen Iverson 's 55 Gives Sixers Game 1 In the illustious history of the Philadelphia 76ers, nobody-- not Wilt, not Julius Erving , not Moses-- had an individual performance like Allen Iverson 's against the New Orleans Hornets. Allen Iverson scored a team playoff-record 55 points as the 76ers defeated the Hornets, 98-90, in Game One of their Eastern Conference first-round series. "He was on fire, Hornets coach Paul Silas said of Allen Iverson , who fell eight points shy of Michael Jordan 's NBA playoff record set exactly 17 years ago in a double-overtime loss at Boston. "We should hit Khurmal during the speech, given that Colin Powell will talk about it." Khurmal is the name of a village near the site. In his U.N. presentation, Colin Powell described it as Terrorist Poison and Explosive Factory, Khurmal. Rumsfeld said Khurmal was operated by Ansar al-Islam, a Sunni militant group with ties to Abu Musab al-Zarqawi , a Jordanian extremist with ties to the al-Qaida terrorist network.
